[vc_row type=”full-width-section” full_height=”yes” columns_placement=”bottom” content_placement=”bottom” parallax=”tt_parallax” parallax_image=”7626″ overlay=”1″ overlay_color=”rgba(10,10,10,0.3)” el_class=”Header”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1603711987376{border-radius: 10px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”APPAREL” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:58|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:55px” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605060812207{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.01) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1603786216707{margin-bottom: -120px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Wear Your Opinion” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:44|text_align:center|color:%23002949|line_height:1.2″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1605061425161{margin-bottom: 5px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”]

[vc_custom_heading text=”When you see a NATO Jacket, you recall AVS! We are the sole suppliers of NATO Jackets from India. It was back 2009, when the company got involved into manufacturing & supplying of uniforms, special purpose workwear, etc has been going since then.
Our apparel manufacturing division allows serving our clients with special needs of workwear. We can make everything from shirts, polos, trousers, caps and other items – we give you the complete set. Our supply portfolio is vast & diversified. From laborer working in factories to officials serving the country, we make it for all of them, as we ensure the products must meet the criteria of quality, durability and safety.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:16|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1628253984583{padding-left: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1603788808831{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-right: 40px !important;margin-left: 10px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #800080 !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”9489″ img_size=”600*375″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” animation=”rda_fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1628250946728{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-right: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;margin-left: -20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our most recent assets include manufacturing and supplying security guard uniforms, police uniforms, and factory workers’ uniforms. Corporate work culture has also given way to corporate workwear & uniforms primarily to enhance visibility and brand image.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our manufacturing vertical has been involved since 2010 in the manufacturing of all such garments, which is growing under the direction and vision of our in-house premium fashionwear brand – House of Tomar’s Founder & Creative Director. Hence, we ensure to maintain quality and precision in creating these products.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1605061504357{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”7489″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1605061510371{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”9510″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1605061518339{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”7499″ img_size=”400*300″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1603970421794{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”FASHION MANUFACTURING” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:40|text_align:center|color:%23800080|line_height:55px” google_fonts=”font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:900%20bold%20regular%3A900%3Anormal” el_class=”text_uppercase letterspacing-2-5″][vc_custom_heading text=”Helping You Grow Your Clothing Brand” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24|text_align:center|color:%23002949|line_height:1″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”We are a decade old manufacturing company and are making quality clothing manufacturing easy, time-bound & accessible. Our clients are from Europe, Africa and UAE. Being in this business for more than a decade has added value to our name. Our in-house fashion vertical House of Tomar caters to premium womenswear range of fashion apparel.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”Here is how we can help you!” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1628491342275{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1628491687925{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”9492″ img_size=”250*350″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”One-stop Solution” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:38|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”We help you get everything you need made under one roof. Save time, money and effort and maintain the quality that’s needed.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:16|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1628490536071{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Lower Your Inventory Risk” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:38|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”We are a MSME organization and a decade old, reputed name in the segment. We ensure to maintain transparency and manufacture understanding the needs of the buyer.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:16|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1628491705913{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”9497″ img_size=”250*350″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1628490548851{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1628491727214{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”9498″ img_size=”250*350″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”We Guarantee Our Quality” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:38|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”We have stricter than industry standard quality checks in place. Our buyers and clients’ reviews speak for the quality manufacturing standards we uphold.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:16|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1628490560383{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”We Make It Easy for You” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:38|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”Share your vision & ideas with us and we take care of the rest! We help you bring it to life, so that you can focus on marketing & building your brand.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:16|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1628492006216{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”9499″ img_size=”250*350″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1628490571122{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1628492040172{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”9500″ img_size=”250*350″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Always Behind Your Back” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:38|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”Work with an experienced and knowledgeable team of helpful professionals who strive towards your brand’s success.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:16|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1628490583055{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Lower Prices as You Grow” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:38|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal”][vc_custom_heading text=”Setting the right cost and price for your product is crucial for your business to be successful. Our pricing justifies the quality we have to offer. Offering competitive pricing for larger orders is a segment we touch up on.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:16|text_align:left|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1628492078664{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”9501″ img_size=”250*350″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width-section” css=”.vc_custom_1628255109127{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f4f4f4 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”To see our work in the premium fashion apparels segment, head to www.houseoftomar.com” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:18|text_align:center|color:%23002949″ google_fonts=”font_family:Poppins%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”]
